lead_paragraph: Membership in the United Automobile Workers rose by nearly 5,200 workers in 2015, to 408,639.

headline.print_headline: Autoworkers Union Grew for 6th Consecutive Year
headline.main: Autoworkers Union Grew for 6th Consecutive Year

snippet: Membership in the United Automobile Workers rose by nearly 5,200 workers in 2015, to 408,639.
abstract: Membership in Detroit-based United Automobile Workers union rose by nearly 5,200 workers in 2015 to 408,639, marking sixth consecutive year of small gains.
